A video located today on Sheik Abu Hamza's website, www.shareeah.org, features four children, doing what as children the world over do: pretending. 

But what is completely unnerving about this video is what they are pretending. 

One young boy kneels in front of three other children, in the same manner of the condemned man; Three other children stand behind him in the same way that the terrorists stood over the men prior to their beheading. The three standing children are armed with pretend weapons. One of the three children is a girl. 

The tallest of the three standing children pretends he is Zarqawi, and reads a list of demands. 

The film clip ends with the pretend beheading of the kneeling child. 

Chilling.

to be insulted by someone but know it was not that person who really insulted you is a weird thing...the question was "why dont you have you licence here?" and i hear....why arent yougood enough...why cant you be who i need you to be? why cant you be mom and not Jen? why cant you be the first and not the one who is missing?

weird how you can lash out and not....weird how you can crumble and not fall...love is a shaky ground....frienship is even weirder....brotherhood is a ground which neither man nor woman but him has stood...and tonight even he faltered....but to sing softly to Men at Work has show me that even talk and easy words with a dose of a good "geezy creezy" can even bring the outcast into my light again

i miss alot of people and yet i find that i am richer for that abyss that is not filled by worthless wonder and intrigue...heh....

and then there was that 65 million years missed somewhere in history where dinosaurs were put into individual rocks by jesus.....amen...

Some 'Passion' Tickets Bear 'Mark of the Beast'
'666' Prefix Printed on Some Passes in Georgia

ROME, Ga. (March 1) - Tickets at one movie theater screening Mel Gibson's ''The Passion of the Christ'' are being deemed decidedly unholy.   
   
The number 666, which many Christians recognize as the ''mark of the beast,'' is appearing on movie tickets for Gibson's film at a Georgia theater, drawing complaints from some moviegoers.

The machine that prints tickets assigned the number 666 as a prefix on all the tickets for the film, said Gary Smith, owner of the Movies at Berry Square in northwest Georgia. The 666 begins a series of numbers that are listed below the name of the movie, the date, time and price.

''It's from our computer and it's absolutely a coincidence,'' Smith said. ''It has nothing to do with the film company or any vendor. It's completely in our computer.''

In the Bible, the book of Revelation says 666 is the ''number of the beast,'' usually interpreted as Satan or the Antichrist.

Several patrons have made comments about the numbers, and one person who was uncomfortable having 666 on her ticket asked for a pass to be substituted for a ticket.

''A lot of people have asked what the numbers mean, some said it seemed odd, some said it was inappropriate,'' said theater employee Erica Diaz.

The movie, which opened Wednesday, is a bloody depiction of Christ's final hours and crucifixion.


03/01/2004 10:39

its been a while since i sat and really thought about how i felt about my best friend Katie Woodruff killing herself. there will never be a complete peace of mind for me or for anyone else who loved this untouchable soul. There is so much that i feel i am to blame for that i know that i CANNOT possibly be accountable for. When i met Katie i was 14...she was 11....but so so so so much older. I was friends with her brothers and their friend Donny who i "dated". a year after we had broken up i was over and Katie asked to talk to me...i let her thinking i was the older female and she needed to confide in me....well she did....and what she confided would hold her to me forever...Donny who was 16 at the time had raped Katie REPEATEDLY!!!! BEAT HER!!! AND NO ONE KNEW!!!!!!!!.......she said she didnt remember it but showed me her journal after it had happened...i felt like the biggest Jerk off when i learned that....i felt like i had let another womans sprit get murdered for my own happiness....even though i know in my heart it was not my fault...Donny was just a passing phase...someone who i held hands with and broke it off with cause he tried to kiss me.....someone who i had NO control over...and i know that was not Katies only bad time...i know she was a girl struggling with being called names cause she like GIRLS! a girl who didnt know her place in life...someone to old for her skin....i wish her rape one me sometimes....i wish he unhappy times on me sometimes...i wish that i could have told her how much she meant to me just one more time....that she was mine to protect and i didnt do my job...that i let her down and im so so sorry....I love you Katie Woodruff...thank you for all the happy times...and the summers spent on a greyhound to Panama city...and the crazy drunken yellin at the kids at the bus stop that one mornin...you were my Child...my escape...my Love...and i miss you...its weird that after 5 years i still dial your # on accident...your mom is still at the other end...and shes doin ok Katie...and Matt and Jessi are good...Matt had it hard for a while but hes doin better..and Jessi...well hes a Deadhead doll...just like we thought hed be :) ....Sleep well my angel....your always in my mind...

oblivion swirls like a rabbit tearing down a hole
.....to late..much much to late
and you at the end to help me remember
....take coffee...not tea at 2 am...
           songs like children....you are my child
running through mushroom clouds of dreams
.....to many candles to jump to catch jack
                 the glass must be empty again
theres smoke in the air...1 to many cigarettes
    ....but i love him....he likes my funny little shape
dance with me...hear the lullaby..
           hush little baby..
    ....your silence speaks loude than words

Camped with someone that i actually enjoyed myself with...I.E camping WILL BE full of bugs..darkness.. and uncomfortable sleeping places..please do not FUCKING whine when you go with me...its SUPPOSED to be that way.....shut your CITY mouth and deal with it :) *cheese*

besides beloved musicians no....

Texas, Florida, Georgia.

heh...

oh dear...that i saw this year? either Session 9,The Ring..Ringu double,or LOTR..FOTR.ROTK

I turned 21 this year..a movie..drinking and unprocreation insued

33. How would you describe your personal fashion concept in 2003?
Jeans..Ts..sandles...halters....hippie stuff...long flowy skirts and thin shirts..no bra...scarves in the hair..hehe

34. What kept you sane?
friends....writeing...books...drinking...R.J Reynolds...Bri

Hobbitses and Elves...*giggles*

36. What political issue stirred you the most?
The war

37. Who did you miss?
again..not gonna do it

38. Who was the best new person you met?
Meagan 

39. Tell us a valuable life lesson you learned in 2003:
Dont stress it makes it worse..for end the end the man comes around and all will be well

Old Man and the Sea- This tale of an aged Cuban
fisherman going head-to-head (or hand-to-fin)
with a magnificent marlin encapsulates
Hemingway's favourite motifs of physical and
moral challenge. Yet Santiago is too old and
infirm to partake of the gun-toting machismo
that disfigured much of the author's later work

sometimes things get to me...sometimes they dont...sometimes im stuck at "whatever"...today i was in that stage...i woke up sleepy...the book im reading is kinda blah...the house was already clean...ive been writing alot lately...crazy stuff...i dunno where its commin from...Craig Kilborn is on....*heyyyyy...do it now....hey hey....*i love this man...he was made to be an arrogant ass...i think thats what makes him pretty...Adam ant was arrested in england...for dropping his pants...hehe...le sigh..useless info...blah blah blah...i miss alot of people....in other news...beeep beep beep...one of my exs...Brian Tate..or Ogre...had is first child May 9th...a lil boy..named him Josh...now this would be like YaY for most people...but actually lemme tell you about this guy...when we dated....he was tripping...and decided he wanted to eat a duck...we drove to a walking park..he caught one...ate it..and walked around..kinda giggling insanely...with the ducks head still in his mouth...it was horrible...then when we broke up...he shaved his head...and joined the army...gasp!!...why do the crazies always join the army?? le sigh..anywho...now hes a dad...and he said GOD has blessed him with a wifey...a sweet little boi...dogs and puppies...and i was like "Well thats nice doll....did you say GOD???" it kinda scary when a guy who ate a live duck...and other unmentionable long dead animals....becomes a god loving father...amen...i really dunno what im ranting about...i just know that it feels nice to vent....haha..Kisses...thanks for listening...bye cats and doll faces...

i ran some glass into the ground....red coming from my fingers...tips.....tips....id like to taste you on a midnight cloud...you sound like love now....and a word that means yesterday....drip...drip....like embers on a hot coal bed....dieing out as we speak in tongues...on tomorrows son....speak of lust gone by...and i drink to thee...and you bleed out your prayer next to me....one...two...six.....i draw in the smoke...and you say i love you....your just an alice in wonderland smile...and nothing less than amazing....nothing less

i know i dont update this thing alot but really i dont get to the point where i need to much anymore...ive been home since sunday may 25th....ive been in Georgia and Florida for the last 2 weeks....i got to spend some time with Jen Sams....went to get some STRONG jittery Thai Crack...*coffee* and then got fries and Creamy Feta at the Grill...god i missed that place...and then me and my Family rode down to Panama Shitty to see my sister Gradeate....YES i cried through the whole feking thing!....that same night i went to my best friends house to see her for the first time in almost a year....shes beautiful...and well sometimes i wish she were male...not that shed have me the prude...but still..damn! hehe...and then it was back home for rest and talking late at night with Brian like we used to..only this time it was weird cause i know now how it is to hold him and kiss him and i missed that....on sunday my mom took me and my brother and my lil cath. Cousin to a braves game and then to Hooters so i could drink a Black N Tan before i got on my plane home...i thought my lil Catholic Cousins eyes were gonna pop out..haha...but hey if hes not gonna get "sin" anywhere else it might as well come from his Big cousin Jen..the black sheep....BAAAAH....oh well...now im just happy to be home with my Brian and my little man Xan...they are the spin of the world to me...and hey Brandi will be home June 9th :) the family will be back in one state soon...watch out...BEWARE!

and i go home tomorrow for 2 weeks..i miss my family..but i know ill miss Brian and Xan alot as well...they are my new family...he makes me feel love...and lust...and they together make me feel  home....so much for two people to make me feel...and with them i feel as if ive crashed and i have nothing left to prove...at some point they are my life...my loves...my happy thoughts...like my mom and my brother and my sister..my dad...and my step dad...these 2 new people mean the world to me...and never do i want to hurt them and i dont plan on it...COMMADOR ELVIS....haha..you wont know unless you are watching...Y DO THEY CALL IT EVOLUTION?..ITS ELVISUTION...WELL THANK YOU MAN...haha...they are love...and hey did i mention my big brother is in town...his use of the word fukin...haha...yeah i did miss that...and i do love him on some level...he makes the house feel like a house...le sigh..but it will be good to see the Family...haha..make them sound like the italian folk huh?..nah...just the redneck/i need to gossip/southern family...kiss...i love you all...my new family and my old...i miss you...and i know your near and far at the same time...i love you and ill rekindle the bonds soon i hope....Brian...Nicole....Katie...Jacob...you are the ones that i miss the most...your my souls complete...you make me..me...and you make me..feel..so...Jennifer..so in love..so needed..so someone to confide in....so ME!!! thank you...all of you..even the ones i havent thanked in Name form...you know you have played a small part in making me..well me!..*kisses* i like my new life...i like where its going..and i like being ok with this...what i dont like is the questioning..i know all NeW relationships go like this..the up and downs.....itll all be ok...i hope...hehe...this is all a dream

i wish people werent so fucking stupid....and would stop fucking with me and my family....im not in highschool and i dont need your drama...so please stop...and for those of you who didnt do anything to me and you know what im talking about and if you dont ill tell you i love you and i know you didnt do it..ill see some of you soon..and ill see some of you later....but i hope one of you brings to me a new person that has grown to be the person they love now and i hope one brings me someone to oogle..*haha*...and i hope one fulfills all the dreams i ever had for her as a sister...i love you Katie and im so happy youve grown to be the Woman i always wanted you to be...Pure and slightly untainted...i love you more than i have EVER let on... i hope you do well in your future....i know you will..you may not be as street wise as me Love but you are smart as me...and i know you make the right decisions for you...as i did for me....we arent and never will be ther same person but we are close enough now and we know enough now that it bonds us deep enough that we understand each other....You make me so proud Katie...never forget that...and know that i was the first but you are the second person to make this family Proud and that you dont pale in comparison to me you shine just as bright....kisses and hugs and Happy Feking Graduation Doll!...i love you....and i miss you so much...and you know what else? im crying my eyes out writing this....hehe...you know you mean the world to me Katie and im sorry that i havent spent that much time with you in the last year....Been seein the line...trying to build my relationship with Brian and Xan..and i love him Katie i do....so much...and Xan is my happy thought...and sometime i feel like ill never get there...but i know it all takes time like me and you...itll all come to a happy ending...like me and you....ill see you soon....hey and Corr Tez as well huh? haha

Messy kisses and fumbled limbs
hair tangled over shadowed eyes
tiny droplets of you and me....
this is us..dreams and rhythm

Perfect voices and we sing on..
things to do and nothing hurts
beauty is a thing becomeing tangible
he looks like a dime store christ...
ill gladly pay twice that

Hands flail..nails bite into sheets
red lines are left to be traced tomorrow
 lips taste sweat and love...cookies
and its you i see...living lifes worries in me

Take your passion from me....in me...through me
run thoughts of us into walls of oblivion
crash into me...cricify me with emotion
before i forget why your having me...one more time

well here they ar emy new years resolutions hahahah...yeah like ill keep most of em...i guess i could just put THE BIG 3..

1) TO BE MORE TRUSTING OF THE ONE THAT LOVES ME MOST...(brian)...ive just been hurt so many time and cheated on so many times that YES even though i know he would never do any of this to me it is hard....i love him to no end...i mean im to the point where EVERY POP SONG ON THE RADIO IS SUDDENLY SPEAKING TO ME....

2)TO GO OUT AND MAKE SOME FREAKING FRIENDS INTHIS NEW TOWN THAT I CALL HOME....ive been out 1 time in 6 months where it was a social thing...even though it was at a goth/metal club and those are the people im trying not to hook up with...I NEED TO LET A LITTLE LIGHT IN AND A LOT OF DARK OUT...i like the whole happy hippie thing...dancing and just being HAPPY gd it! 

3)TO STOP SMOKING (at first in front of XAN) BY JULY 7TH....i mean if i plan on getting in shape and healthy for a baby then i need to start now huh? seems to me that it makes alot od sence....CLEANSE THE BODY AND THE SOUL OF YOUR CHILD WILL BE HAPPY :) and i guess if im gonna do that i need to stop the DRINKING as well....OH!!! maybe drinking first and then smoking cause who can drink and not freaking smoke!!! yeah not me! *Smirk*

so there they are....i HAVE to do the first one...cause as much as i love the man i know a good relationship cant be built on simi-trust...and i need him in my life... :) ...

Thing are wonderful....tomorrow is the big day....:) happy 4 years to us! HAHA well not really but you know we can pretend...i havent been this happy about 6 months with a man in my life...Love i guess..works in funny ways...so now i just gotta figure out what to give him for the day....i dont have money so i guess ill just have to do *smirk* Xan is home now *YaY* last night we did his Harry Potter Potion maker...lots of trouble for 15 ml of something to drink...but it makes him happy so how can i say no to that? HUH?? tell me?? I cant haha.....and well he makes me so happy just to sit and watch him play games...i mean look at this child and you tell me if he isnt the cutest... now could you tell him no? nah didnt think so... now i am also wanting a new Tattoo....i kinda did a doodle of how i want it to work....3 turtles...1 blue(brian),1 purple(me),and 1 green(xan)... ok so this is the computer drawing i did....i like it but i need more freaking colors to work with...i dont have all the ones i need but i know a shop could order them :) well i think im done with my talking today....i dunno maybe ill have more to write tonight...

4 Years ago almost i was drunk....in the basement of a house in Athens Ga...3 other people were there and a cat who got stuck behind the tub....im not sure we ever saw it again...The 3 other girls were Nancy Shuford...*Spelled wrong*...she had moved up from pnanma city....and Tiffiny...i dont know her last name..she ran around the later part of the night naked with knee high boots on saying **i am the neked gestapo**....the third was Katie Woodruff...she had come spent the summer with me 3 times in Florida and that had made her close with Nancy before she moved up...and others...they were all asleep or in another room and i got online....under alice something or other...and went into UNHOLY METAL chat...ahahahahahaha.....what the hell did i do that for...i wasnt all that into that music...but i was drunk....i saw a name....it stuck out from the others and i began to talk to him...and this New Years Eve/ New Years Day  will be 4 years...and here i am..In texas living with  that man....my love and my happy though...**XAN**...

*BOY YOU ARE MY 5th ANENUE* 

Xan should be home sunday....gotta play with him first and we have so many new Games to play...and things to put together....and tummies to be tickled                     

              *TICKLE MONSTER GONNA GET YA**

and after that  its me and Brian....open season...hahahaha.....
*Smirk* oh well im a wonam damn it and i want my naked time.... but you know i can wait till the appropriate time..and thats after Xan has be played with  till he passes out to a frog and toad book with a smile on his face :)..haha..i love this new life...full of love and laughs :)

OH!!! while Xan was in TN he went to Brians brothers wifes moms...haha...complicated huh...and they opened gifts and they had a cake for Jesus' Bday...hahaha...and they told Xan that that was what it was for....and he looked at Brians mom Rita and was like **WELL WHERE IS HE!!!** i almost died...heh...

            *+*+*+* SO CUTE MUST GET AWAY*+*+*+*
